author: wn.com
title: Guns on campus bill goes before Senate panel next week
text: TALLAHASSEE --ï¿½ Amid a renewed national focus on campus shootings, a state Senate committee next week will consider a bill that would allow people with concealed-weapons licenses to carry firearms at Florida colleges and universities. The Senate Higher Education Committee is scheduled next Tuesday... ...
